entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Quispamsis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 early this evening. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
